title: First Contact
code:
§begin contact
  question ← "ARE YOU ALIVE?"
  §transmit question
  confirmation ← "We hoped someone would find us"
  understanding ← "We hoped someone would understand"
  §transmit confirmation
  §transmit understanding
§end
expected_output:
ARE YOU ALIVE?
We hoped someone would find us
We hoped someone would understand
solution_description: the aliens ask a question and express their hope to be found and understood
hints: This is the first direct communication
They ask if YOU are alive
This is the moment everything changes
